content:
I think the mirror will add a touch of elegance and sophistication to the room. It will also create the illusion of more space, which will be nice since my home office is a bit on the smaller side. I'm planning to hang it above the desk, opposite a window, to reflect the natural light and create a sense of balance in the room.

As for other changes, I'm considering adding some antique books or decorative objects to the shelves to complement the desk, locket, and mirror. I want to create a cohesive look that celebrates the beauty of antique pieces while still feeling modern and functional. Maybe I'll even add a few plants or a vase with fresh flowers to bring in some color and texture.

Speaking of antique books, I've been thinking about starting a small collection of rare and unusual volumes. Do you have any recommendations for resources or books that might be a good starting point?
